nodes.text: Kestic Station was a small trading outpost located near the planet Bestine on the edge of the Bestine system. It was the home of the human pilot Zev Senesca, who fought for the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

Kestic Station was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the Star Wars: Card Trader app on a card released on March 11, 2015. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Kestic Station was first mentioned in 1989's Galaxy Guide 3: The Empire Strikes Back, a roleplaying game supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by Michael Stern.
